column5: A quiet Rockport cottage with great access to fishing, kayaking and boating plus two different beaches. HEB is just a few minutes away, along with restaurants, museums and the local aquarium.  The space itself is a master bed and bath that can be closed off from the rest of the house. We don't pretend to be providing luxury accommodations, but everything is cleaned and scrubbed before you arrive and we will try our best to make you feel welcome and at home during your relaxing stay.
column8: Clean, Quiet Spot to Shower + Rest
